description: I really like this Terminal program. It's nice how the colors change when you ssh into another machine, or run something using sudo

summary: Currently one of the best terminals for GNOME

description: Remote and root color is a nice touch. It would be good if container also has colors.
In my opinion, this is currently the best GNOME terminal app available.

I use this app as my daily driver for all terminal tasks, and I really like it! Its integration with toolbox containers is superb: I no longer have to type `toolbox enter` every time I open the terminal!

I also especially like the available color schemes: There's tons, and my personal favourite, Catppuccin, is also included.

Looks and functions great. Although some cons
1. Uses too much resources (~250mb ram & ~150mb video memory).
2. Option to disable header bar is not present.
